description: Background: Part1: Most of cities in the world are occupied by robots in 2109.Human are ruled by robots at that time. But some cities are struggling to battle with the enemies. Hunman spend all the resources to produce military forces to fight with robots.Finally, following with the Big-Four lengend generals coming, hunman defeat the robots finally.The win day is 10/05/2149. Part2: Robots are defeated although, human don't destroy them. Human find out a new way to controller the robots to avoid them rebel again. Without the robots, peace time don't last long. Human begin grab resources with each other. So a new war begin among the unions, which ever united from some leaders of cities to fight with the robots. human also let the robots involed into the new war. New war is more firece and terrible. Robots,unions fight with each other. This is the game robot war for part1. There is another robot war2 for part2, it will be a multi players online strategy game.It will be released in the future base on the game one. For those who find out bugs when playing the game. I suggest you update the latest version.If bugs still exist, please restart the game, maybe data of game is broken, it will initial your game data again, also you old data is cleared. If time is permited, there will be a story to describe the whole story in details. If you have problems ,please send email to me. My email is itcrown2005@hotmail.com Some tips: 1.produce more farms and mine factories 2.hire a general when fight with enemies. 3.produce more army,tank,aircraft 4.producing more tank_armories,army_barracks,aircraft_armories will 5 increase the speed of your army,tank,aircraft production. 6.Upgrade will make you power more strong 7.The more you power mean the less you losses when you fight with enemies
